html: {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.reference_date,'ddMMYYYY') if doc.reference_date else '' }} {{ doc.account_no or '' }} {{ doc.party }} {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Account", doc.paid_from, "account_type") == 'Bank' -%} {% set tot_debit = [0] %} {% set tot_credit = [0] %} {%- for row in frappe.get_list(doctype="GL Entry",fields = ["name","account", "party_type", "party", "debit", "credit", "cost_center"],filters = {"voucher_no":doc.name},order_by = "-debit") -%} {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Account", row.account, "account_type") == 'Bank' -%} {% if tot_debit.append(tot_debit.pop() + row.debit) %}{% endif %} {% if tot_credit.append(tot_credit.pop() + row.credit) %}{% endif %} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.payment_type == "Pay" -%} {{frappe.utils.money_in_words(tot_credit[0])[3:]}} {%- else -%} {{frappe.utils.money_in_words(tot_debit[0])[3:]}} {%- endif -%} {%- else -%} {{frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.base_paid_amount_after_tax or doc.base_received_amount_after_tax)[3:]}} {%- endif -%} {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Account", doc.paid_from, "account_type") == 'Bank' -%} {% set tot_debit = [0] %} {% set tot_credit = [0] %} {%- for row in frappe.get_list(doctype="GL Entry",fields = ["name","account", "party_type", "party", "debit", "credit", "cost_center"],filters = {"voucher_no":doc.name},order_by = "-debit") -%} {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Account", row.account, "account_type") == 'Bank' -%} {% if tot_debit.append(tot_debit.pop() + row.debit) %}{% endif %} {% if tot_credit.append(tot_credit.pop() + row.credit) %}{% endif %} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.payment_type == "Pay" -%} {{ '{0:,.2f}'.format(tot_credit[0]) }} {%- else -%} {{ '{0:,.2f}'.format(tot_debit[0]) }} {%- endif -%} {%- else -%} {{ '{0:,.2f}'.format(doc.base_paid_amount_after_tax) if doc.base_paid_amount else '{0:,.2f}'.format(doc.base_received_amount_after_tax) }} {%- endif -%}
